name: Central Hubb AdServer Client
author: www.centralhubb.com

sections.description: Hassle-free youtube video and image advert management with analytics and short tags — all in one place.
sections.installation:
1. Active Plugin
  2. Create Free CentralHubb Account via the Plugin
  3. Copy the CentralHubb Api Keys into WordPress Settings
  4. Start Using Plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Active Plugin
  2. Create Free CentralHubb Account via the Plugin
  3. Copy the CentralHubb Api Keys into WordPress Settings
  4. Start Using Plugin

Is Central Hubb Ad Server free?

Yes! Central Hubb Ad Server core features are and always will be free.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Initial Release – Release date: May 17, 2018

  • Youtube Video Management
  • Image Playlist Management
  • Embeddable short tags
  • Analytics Charts

Enhancements

  • Images Playlist: We created short tags for the images playlist.
  • Videos Manager: We created a simple video manager with short tags.
  • Visual Analytics: We created multi metric dynamic visual charts for analytics.

Bug fixes

  • Plugin: Improved Input Sanitizing.
  • Plugin: Improved api routing.

short_description: The ideal plugin for stats, related posts, search engine optimization, social sharing, protection, backups, security, and more.
description: Hassle-free youtube video and image advert management with analytics and short tags — all in one place.

upgrade_notice:
1. We aim to keep all upgrades as none code breaking upgrades.
  2. All upgrades should work seemlessly without extra requirements.
